      • allowsHide

        public boolean allowsHide(String toolId)
        Checks to see if a given tool is allowed to be hidden. Useful for tools that have other requried permissions where setting the page as visible may not make it visible to all users and thus causes some confusion.
        Returns:
        true if this tool is allowed to be hidden

      • allowsHide

        public boolean allowsHide(SitePage page)
        Checks to see if a given SitePage is allowed to be hidden. Useful for pages with tools that have other requried permissions where setting the page as visible may not make it visible to all users and thus causes some confusion.
        Returns:
        true if this tool is allowed to be hidden
